lead_paragraph: Both feeling refreshed and recharged, Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray each won in straight sets Thursday to reach the quarterfinals at the Shanghai Masters.
snippet: Both feeling refreshed and recharged, Novak Djokovic and Andy Murray each won in straight sets Thursday to reach the quarterfinals at the Shanghai Masters....

headline.main: Djokovic, Murray Advance to Shanghai Masters Quarterfinals
headline.print_headline: Djokovic, Murray Advance to Shanghai Masters Quarterfinals
